original_text: Yes, I came from the Father, and I came into this world. Now I will leave this world and I will return to the Father.’
korean_text: 내가 아버지에게서 나와 세상에 왔고 다시 세상을 떠나 아버지께로 가노라 하시니

sentences.original_text: Yes, I came from the Father
and I came into this world
Now I will leave this world
and I will return to the Father
